mapper.select: SELECT /*umusrDAO.selectUsrConfirmPw_001*/ USR_PW as usrPw , SALT as salt FROM IRUSRACNT WHERE USR_ID=#{usrId}

SELECT /*umusrDAO.selectUsrInfo_001*/ USR_ID as usrId, USR_PW as usrPw, USR_NM as usrNm, USR_TEL1 as usrTel1, USR_TEL2 as usrTel2, USR_TEL3 as usrTel3, USR_EMAIL1 as usrEmail1, USR_EMAIL2 as usrEmail2, USE_YN as useYn, EMAIL_AUTH_YN as emailAuthYn, PW_RGT_DTM as pwRgtDtm, PW_INIT_YN as pwInitYn, LST_LOGIN_DTM as lstLoginDtm, SALT as salt FROM IRUSRACNT WHERE USR_ID=#{usrId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /*umusrDAO.insertUsrAcnt_001*/ IRUSRACNT ( USR_ID, USR_PW, USR_NM, USR_TEL1, USR_TEL2, USR_TEL3, USR_EMAIL1, USR_EMAIL2, USE_YN, EMAIL_AUTH_YN, RGTR_ID, RGT_DTM, PW_RGT_DTM, PW_INIT_YN, SALT ) VALUES ( #{usrId}, #{usrPw}, #{usrNm}, #{usrTel1}, #{usrTel2}, #{usrTel3}, #{usrEmail1}, #{usrEmail2}, 'Y', 'Y', 'SYSTEM', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmddhh24miss'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmddhh24miss'), 'N', #{salt})

INSERT INTO /*umusrDAO.insertUsrEmailSuc_001*/ IRUSREMAILHIS ( USR_ID, AUTH_NUM, EMAIL_AUTH_YN, RGTR_ID, RGT_DTM ) VALUES ( #{usrId}, #{authNum}, #{emailAuthYn}, 'SYSTEM', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmddhh24miss') )
mapper.update: UPDATE /*umusrDAO.umUpdUsrEmailFinAuth_001*/ IRUSREMAILHIS SET EMAIL_AUTH_YN = 'Y' WHERE USR_ID = #{usrId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /*umUsrDAO.insertUsrLDVSRN_001*/ IRUSRLDVSRN ( USR_ID, POSTCODE, BD_MGT_SN, ADR_TYPE, USR_SEL_TYPE, SEL_YN, JIBUN_ADR , ROAD_ADR , SIDO , SIGUNGU , SIGUNGU_SN , ROAD_SN , BD_SN , ROAD_NM , BD_NM , BD_NM1 , BD_NM2 , H_NM , DTL_ADR, EXTRA_ADR , BD_MGT_NM ) VALUES( #{usrId}, #{postCode}, #{bdMgtSn} , #{adrType}, #{usrSelType}, #{selYn}, #{jibunAdr} , #{roadAdr} , #{sido} , #{sigungu} , #{sigunguSn} , #{roadSn} , #{bdSn} , #{roadNm} , #{bdNm} , #{bdNm1} , #{bdNm2} , #{hNm} , #{dtlAdr} , #{extraAdr} , #{bdMgtNm} )
mapper.select: SELECT /*umUsrDAO.selectUsrChkId_001*/ DECODE(COUNT(1),0,'1','2') as cnt FROM IRUSRACNT WHERE USR_ID=#{usrId}
mapper.update: UPDATE /*umusrDAO.umUpdUsrLoginDtm_001*/ IRUSRACNT SET LST_LOGIN_DTM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmddhh24miss') WHERE USR_ID = #{usrId}
